entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
